text: Freddy Buache (29 December 1924 â€“ 28 May 2019) was a Swiss journalist, movie critic and historian. He was the director of the Swiss Film Archive from 1951 to 1996. He was a privatdozent at the University of Lausanne. Buache was born in Lausanne. Buache died on 28 May 2019 at the age of 94.Freddy Buache, disparition d'un passeur ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Swiss writers Category:Swiss journalists Category:Movie critics Category:Swiss historians Category:People from Lausanne
